title: Florida Matters: Education Town Hall
teaser: This week on Florida Matters, we're bringing you highlights of an education town hall hosted by WUSF at Artz 4 Life Academy in Clearwater on March 10. We check in with a panel of education experts, and we hear from parents in Pinellas County about the issues they're seeing in public schools. We also discuss some of the issues raised in the upcoming documentary "180 Days: Hartsville," which will air on WUSF-TV on Sunday, March 29 at 9 p.m.
